name: Twitter Stream Globe
description: A real-time 3D visualization of Tweets around the world. Uses three.js (WebGL), Angular & PubNub.

TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY.description: Twitter Consumer Key generated at apps.twitter.com (required)

TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Twitter Consumer Secret generated at apps.twitter.com (required)

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Twitter Access Token generated at apps.twitter.com (required)

TWITTER_TOKEN_SECRET.description: Twitter Token Secret generated at apps.twitter.com (required)

PUBNUB_PUBLISH_KEY.description: PubNub Publish Key generated at admin.pubnub.com (required)

PUBNUB_SUBSCRIBE_KEY.description: PubNub Subscribe Key generated at admin.pubnub.com (required)
